text: 6:35 Ofa Gami 25:35-36; Onger Akaba 37:26; Matyu 5:45Ia uan apanibagh ifuegh deravɨra me damu, biziba pura me danɨngɨva, uamategh da ikarvaziba inisɨ nɨghnɨghan markɨ. God arazir aghuiba gumazir arazir kurabagh amiba ko gumazir a mɨnabir puvatɨzibagh ami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gɨn ian ivezim bar ekeveghtɨ, ia Godɨn Bar Pɨn Itimɨn boribar mɨn ikiam.
